package.name: Auth
package.description:
The PEAR::Auth package provides methods for creating an authentication system using PHP.
Currently it supports the following storage containers to read/write the login data:
* All databases supported by the PEAR database layer * Plaintext files * LDAP servers

release.notes: * Make it possible to use different encrypting methods than md5. Right now the system supports plaintext, md5 and crypt. * Database storage container: Only open connection to SQL server if it is really necessary.
